MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY6 postcode areas of Fife, Glenrothes & Leslie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm to repair a fault on our overhead line network at Wester Balgothrie and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:51am on the 27th of March 2021.
